General.Name: Fonet Bilgi Teknolojileri AS
General.Description: Fonet Bilgi Teknolojileri Anonim Sirketi engages in the information technology services in the healthcare sector in Turkey. The company offers information management systems, system integration, consultancy, and turnkey project services. It also provides Fonet Hospital Information Management System that manages medical, administrative, and financial business processes of health institutions within automation system. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.
